content: # Pricing Rule User Guide This guide explains how to use the Pricing Rule app. It is written for everyday users, not developers. ## What this app does - Limits discounts by Item Group or specific Items. - Requires approval when discounts exceed the allowed limit. - Updates selling price for imported items using landed cost. ## Who should use this - Sales Users: create quotations and sales orders. - Sales Managers: approve discounts that exceed the limit. - System Managers: maintain rules and guide content. ## Before you start Make sure you have: - Access to the **Item Group Discount Rule** list. - Access to **Quotation** or **Sales Order**. - The correct role for approvals (Sales Manager). ## Create a rule for an Item Group Use this when you want the same discount limit for all items in a group. 1. Go to Item Group Discount Rule. 2. Click **Add Item Group Discount Rule**. 3. Set **Apply On** to **Item Group**. 4. Choose the **Item Group**. 5. Set **Start Date** and optional **End Date**. 6. Set **Maximum Discount Percentage**. 7. Click **Reload Items** to pull the group items. 8. Remove any items you do not want this rule to apply to. 9. Save the rule. Notes: - If a group has no items, the list stays empty. - Items you delete from the list stay excluded. ## Create a rule for specific Items Use this when you want a rule for only a few items. 1. Go to Item Group Discount Rule. 2. Click **Add Item Group Discount Rule**. 3. Set **Apply On** to **Item**. 4. Add only the items you want in the **Items** table. 5. Set **Start Date**, optional **End Date**, and **Maximum Discount Percentage**. 6. Save the rule. Notes: - The Items table only shows the items you add. ## How discount approval works - When a discount exceeds the rule limit, the document requires approval. - Quotation and Sales Order will show **Approval Status**. - Sales Managers can approve or return the request. ### Approval status colors - Draft - Pending Approval - Approved - Submitted ### Request approval 1. Save your Quotation or Sales Order. 2. If approval is required, change status to **Pending Approval** using the workflow action. 3. Wait for a Sales Manager to approve. ### Approve or return Sales Managers can open the document and select **Approve** or **Return for Amendment**. ## Update item discounts on existing items If you change a rule and want to update item discounts: 1. Open the rule. 2. Click **Refresh/Update Items**. 3. The system updates `max_discount` on items in the rule. ## Imported items and landed cost If an item is marked as **Imported**, the app can update its selling price using landed cost: - On Purchase Receipt or Landed Cost Voucher submit, the price is recalculated. - You can also click **Recalculate Selling Price** from the Item form. ## Common questions **Q: I do not see the guide in search.** A: Make sure you are logged in and have the **System User** role. **Q: An item should not be affected by a rule.** A: Remove it from the rule item list and save. It will stay excluded. **Q: Why is approval required?** A: The discount on at least one item is above the allowed limit. ## Need help? Contact your System Manager or Sales Manager for help with rules or approvals.
